bullet: Modular project structuring making heavy use of Sass/SCSS functionality and component-driven design
Mixins and functions to easily create dynamic CSS
Using Sass to create simple and efficient media-query management for rapid development of responsive designs
name: Sass
desc: I usually use SCSS instead of CSS because of the added advantages provided by nesting, mixins, functions, and programming logic. I've used Sass/SCSS in quite a few projects and am more than familiar with using it to supercharge a project's CSS.
